sentences.sContent: How many are mine iniquities and sins? make me to know my transgression and my sin.
sentences.sContent_eng: How many are mine iniquities and sins? make me to know my transgression and my sin.
sentences.sCn: 我的罪孽和罪过有多少呢。求你叫我知道我的过犯与罪愆。

sentences.sContent: Conscience is the detective that watches the direction of our steps and decries every conscious transgression.
sentences.sContent_eng: Conscience is the detective that watches the direction of our steps and decries every conscious transgression.
sentences.sCn: 良心就像是一个侦察员，它时刻关注着我们脚步的方向，谴责我们想犯罪的意识。

remMethod.val: 来自transgress(v. 越轨； 违背)
